entry.em: ..COLD WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM CST TUESDAY

entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF FLURRIES
COLD WITH LOWS AROUND 6 ABOVE
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING NORTHWEST AFTER MIDNIGHT

SUNNY, COLD WITH HIGHS AROUND 14
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
WIND CHILL READINGS AS LOW AS 5 BELOW IN THE MORNING

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
COLD WITH LOWS AROUND 7 ABOVE
SOUTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
WIND CHILL READINGS AS LOW AS 1 BELOW AFTER MIDNIGHT

MOSTLY SUNNY
NOT AS COOL WITH HIGHS IN THE LOWER 30S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SPRINKLES AND FLURRIES IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 30S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF FLURRIES IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 30S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 40 PERCENT CHANCE OF RAIN
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 40S

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF RAIN
A CHANCE OF FREEZING RAIN AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S
CHANCE OF PRECIPITATION 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF FLURRIES IN THE MORNING
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 40S
